byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Bhadra Sharma from Kathmandu, Nepal; Austin Ramzy and Chris Buckley from Hong Kong; Kenneth Chang from New York; and Hari Kumar, Suhasini Raj, Nida Najar and Gardiner Harris from New Delhi.

lead_paragraph: Dozens of deaths and more than a thousand injuries were reported in the quake, which came just weeks after the devastating April 25 temblor.

headline.print_headline: Weeks After Deadly Nepal Quake, Another Temblor Revives Fears
headline.main: Weeks After Deadly Nepal Quake, Another Temblor Revives Fears

snippet: Dozens of deaths and more than a thousand injuries were reported in the quake, which came just weeks after the devastating April 25 temblor.
abstract: Second earthquake with magnitude of 7.3 hits eastern Nepal, less than three weeks after devastating quake; 65 deaths and 1,988 injuries are reported.
